entry.id: Crowdestor informs investors about its outstanding portfolio - 2024-04-22T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Crowdestor informs investors about its outstanding portfolio
entry.content: Crowdestor released information about the status of outstanding projects. The platform identifies €27.94 M of its portfolio as problematic.

entry.id: CrowdedHero offers investments in SIMPLEROS for a 14.25% annual return - 2024-04-19T00:00:00Z
entry.title: CrowdedHero offers investments in SIMPLEROS for a 14.25% annual return
entry.content: CrowdedHero offers the option to invest in SIMPLEROS, a Spanish lending company founded and operated by Santa Lemsa, former Chief Risk Officer at the Robocash Group. The project offers a fixed loan term of 2 years and semi-annual interest payouts.

entry.id: Mintos announces the next crowdfunding round - 2024-03-29T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Mintos announces the next crowdfunding round
entry.content: Mintos announced it will start the next crowdfunding campaign on Crowdcube in early April. A return on investment is made via a liquidity event such as an IPO or Mintos being acquired by another company.

entry.id: LendPlus from South Africa started listing loans on PeerBerry - 2024-03-19T00:00:00Z
entry.title: LendPlus from South Africa started listing loans on PeerBerry
entry.content: Aventus Group lender LendPlus from South Africa has started offering short-term loans on PeerBerry. The South African loans are backed with a buyback and a group guarantee and will generate an 11% annual return to PeerBerry investors. LendPlus ZA loans will be available on the platform every business day. If these loans meet your investment strategy, include LendPlus ZA in your Auto Invest portfolio.

entry.id: Crowdpear is adjusting limits on discounts and premiums on the secondary market - 2024-03-07T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Crowdpear is adjusting limits on discounts and premiums on the secondary market
entry.content: In response to feedback and requests from investors, the platform adjusted pricing limits on the secondary market. The maximum premium price limit is set at +20%, and a maximum discount limit of -50% for trades on the secondary market.

entry.id: CreditStar is decreasing the amount in pending payments - 2024-03-07T00:00:00Z
entry.title: CreditStar is decreasing the amount in pending payments
entry.content: Some investors reported that the amount in pending payments from CreditStar has decreased in recent days.

entry.id: Investors are experiencing withdrawal delays - 2024-02-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Investors are experiencing withdrawal delays
entry.content: Bondora reported a technical issue, causing withdrawals to be "stuck" in "reserved funds."

entry.id: Debitum will be migrating to a new domain - 2024-02-27T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Debitum will be migrating to a new domain
entry.content: From February 28, 2024, the business loan platform Debitum will transition to a new domain: debitum.investments

entry.id: The Office of Competition and Consumer Protection in Poland fines CreamFinance amid their illegal refinancing practices - 2024-02-23T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The Office of Competition and Consumer Protection in Poland fines CreamFinance amid their illegal refinancing practices
entry.content: For violating the collective interests of consumers, the Office of Competition and Consumer Protection imposed a financial penalty on Creamfinance Poland of PLN 2,949,471. Three related entities were also fined: MDP Finance – PLN 1,885,941, KIM Finance – PLN 2,545,098 and JJK Credit – PLN 88,833. There is no imminent risk for investors as the lenders from Poland have no exposure on Esketit.

entry.id: VIVUS repaid all delayed loans - 2024-02-09T00:00:00Z
entry.title: VIVUS repaid all delayed loans
entry.content: The loan originator, VIVUS from Mexico, repaid the outstanding amount, including accrued interest, back to investors.

entry.id: Exclusive Interview: EstateGuru's Recovery Plan For 2024 - 2024-02-09T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Exclusive Interview: EstateGuru's Recovery Plan For 2024
entry.content: Dive into exclusive insights with the CEO at EstateGuru. Learn about the expected recoveries in 2024, forecasted loss rates for Germany, Finland, and the Baltics, pivotal credit policy changes, and EstateGuru's financial health.

entry.id: Reinvest24 has suspended primary and secondary market transaction - 2024-02-06T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Reinvest24 has suspended primary and secondary market transaction
entry.content: The platform informed investors that it is temporarily pausing transactions on the secondary market. Reinvest24 also removed the primary market offers. Last month, the Estonian Financial Supervisory issued a warning as Reinvest24 is operating without the necessary authorization.

entry.id: New criteria for defaulted loans - 2024-01-29T00:00:00Z
entry.title: New criteria for defaulted loans
entry.content: The essential criteria for a loan to be classified as default on LANDE include a payment delay exceeding 90 days (with variations based on market or schedule type), absence of refinancing options, and/or a complete lack of communication between the borrower and debt collection officers.

entry.id: LANDE expects to receive the ECSP license by the end of the month - 2024-01-18T00:00:00Z
entry.title: LANDE expects to receive the ECSP license by the end of the month
entry.content: LANDE currently continues its operations in Latvia, as the company is in the final stages of obtaining the required license. The Latvian regulator has not mandated a halt in operations. Operations in Romania are currently paused, pending the acquisition of the necessary license.

entry.id: LANDE is in the process of updating its debt collection policy - 2024-01-18T00:00:00Z
entry.title: LANDE is in the process of updating its debt collection policy
entry.content: The exact criteria for a loan moving into default status will be communicated to investors in the upcoming newsletter, expected to be released in the next few days.

entry.id: The platform is raising funds to cover legal fees against its shareholder and borrower KIRSAN - 2024-01-09T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The platform is raising funds to cover legal fees against its shareholder and borrower KIRSAN
entry.content: Reinvest24 is raising funds from "a limited group of verified investors, who have a serious interest in Reinvest24 succeeding with the legal recovery". Many concerned investors are questioning Reinvest24's intentions, given the platform is not replying to emails and is delaying withdrawals for up to 40 days. Since Reinvest24 is not regulated in Estonia, it's questionable whether the company can raise further funds from retail investors. Reinvest24 has not given enough information about the legal action or the portfolio performance in Spain. Any further investments on this platform are connected with extreme risk.

entry.id: The investigation into Nexo has been closed - 2023-12-27T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The investigation into Nexo has been closed
entry.content: The investigation into Nexo was ended on the grounds that Bulgaria found no evidence of crime.

entry.id: Afranga has moved to sticredit.eu - 2023-12-29T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Afranga has moved to sticredit.eu
entry.content: The platform moved to a new domain, sticredit.eu, until the company updated its website afranga.com to fit the regulatory requirements.

entry.id: Instant Exit Program is currently disabled - 2023-12-29T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Instant Exit Program is currently disabled
entry.content: Instant Exit has been temporarily disabled while EstateGuru updates the program to align with the new European Crowdfunding Regulations.

entry.id: A portion of funds from VIVUS MX has been repaid - 2023-12-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: A portion of funds from VIVUS MX has been repaid
entry.content: The loan originator, Vivus from Mexico, repaid about 65% of the outstanding debt to investors.

entry.id: Vote for the worst P2P lending platform - 2023-12-23T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Vote for the worst P2P lending platform
entry.content: Have you felt cheated by P2P lending platforms? Get ready to voice your concerns and shed light on issues within the P2P lending industry! Click the link below to cast your vote and expose the shortcomings of the worst platform.

entry.id: Esketit offers investments in music royalties - 2023-12-20T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Esketit offers investments in music royalties
entry.content: Investors can now earn 9% interest by investing in advances for artists through Utopia. Those investments come with a 90-day buyback obligation. The advances will be added to Esketit's automated Diversified strategy from 02.01.2024.

entry.id: PeerBerry exited the Polish loan listings - 2023-12-20T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry exited the Polish loan listings
entry.content: PeerBerry completed the repayments of the last Polish loans. Over EUR 20 million of Polish loans and the accrued interest were repaid to investors in November and December. The platform plans to onboard ten new lenders in H1 2024.

entry.id: LANDE is pausing all transactions on the secondary market - 2023-12-19T00:00:00Z
entry.title: LANDE is pausing all transactions on the secondary market
entry.content: LANDE announced that it is temporarily pausing transactions on the secondary market until the platform migrates to the new IT system.

entry.id: The platform is temporarily pausing new loan listings - 2023-11-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The platform is temporarily pausing new loan listings
entry.content: Due to the ongoing crowdfunding application, Lendermarket has temporarily paused new loan listings on the platform.

entry.id: Credito365 from Mexico starts offering loans on PeerBerry - 2023-12-01T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Credito365 from Mexico starts offering loans on PeerBerry
entry.content: Aventus Group lender Credito365 from Mexico has started offering short-term loans on the PeerBerry platform. Mexican loans are backed with a buyback and a group guarantee and will generate a 10% annual return to PeerBerry investors.

entry.id: Reinvest24 fails to update investors on latest developments - 2023-12-01T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Reinvest24 fails to update investors on latest developments
entry.content: The Estonian crowdlending platform Reinvest24 fails to communicate the progress on the loan recoveries in Moldova and the non-performing Spanish portfolio.

entry.id: Vivus from Mexico isn't honoring the buyback guarantee - 2023-12-01T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Vivus from Mexico isn't honoring the buyback guarantee
entry.content: The payday lender, Vivus from Mexico, has still not covered all the obligations towards investors. The platform fails to communicate updates regarding the non-fulfillment of the buyback obligation from Vivus.

entry.id: Technical maintenance works - 2023-12-01T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Technical maintenance works
entry.content: InRento announced that some of the platform's features may not be accessible from the 1. December 4 PM (EET) until the 4. December 12 PM due to scheduled maintenance work.

entry.id: First recovery from the German portfolio is expected in Q2/2024 - 2023-11-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: First recovery from the German portfolio is expected in Q2/2024
entry.content: 5% of the German portfolio is performing well, with borrowers seeking refinancing or project exit. About 50% of defaulted borrowers are cooperating with partner Steinberg for resolution, while 10% undergo asset search or legal actions. The most challenging 35% face a 2-year recovery timeline with ongoing legal efforts. Seven insolvency proceedings are underway, taking at least a year, and forced auctions are avoided due to market conditions.

entry.id: Twino is broadening its footprint in the riskiest market - 2023-11-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Twino is broadening its footprint in the riskiest market
entry.content: TWINO has just revealed its plans to expand its lending portfolio in Vietnam, a market widely viewed as one of the riskiest for lending globally. Regulatory challenges have led many established lending groups to exit Vietnam.

entry.id: Update on the merger with KoM - 2023-11-11T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Update on the merger with KoM
entry.content: Kapitaal op Maat (KoM) and Max Crowdfund (MCF) have teamed up to strengthen their presence in the European crowdfunding market. KoM, leveraging its European Crowdfunding Service Provider Regulation (ECSPR) license, is expanding its crowdfunding activities across Europe following the acquisition of Capital Circle's platform. Simultaneously, MCF seeks a partnership for continuity without an ECSPR permit but with an AFM exemption. Discussions are underway for a potential merger to enhance European expansion, with both parties actively engaging potential partners. MCF is launching a Series-B equity round to fund growth, inviting existing shareholders and users of MCF, KoM, and Capital Circle. The raised funds will also go towards acquiring additional platforms, creating a unified European marketplace.

entry.id: Lendermarket will start listing loans from Rapicredit - 2023-11-07T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Lendermarket will start listing loans from Rapicredit
entry.content: Rapicredit will use Lendermarket to list its Colombian loans with an 18% interest. Rapicredit has just repaid its debt to investors on Bondster after not honoring the buyback guarantee for 12 months.

entry.id: Afranga increases loan availability - 2023-11-05T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Afranga increases loan availability
entry.content: Afranga has increased loan availability from its in-house loan originator, Stikcredit. The platform offers 10% APY for investments in loans from Bulgaria.

entry.id: Latest statistical data has been updated - 2023-11-05T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Latest statistical data has been updated
entry.content: P2P Empire updated the publicly available statistical data from all platforms.

entry.id: Exclusive interview with the CEO about the delisting of loans from Poland - 2023-11-04T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Exclusive interview with the CEO about the delisting of loans from Poland
entry.content: PeerBerry will be delisting all loans from Poland, representing 17% of PeerBerry's outstanding portfolio. Watch our exclusive interview with the CEO, Arunas Lekavicius, where we discuss the changes and upcoming plans for PeerBerry.

entry.id: Banking holidays in Lithuania from 1. to 2. November 2023 - 2023-10-31T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Banking holidays in Lithuania from 1. to 2. November 2023
entry.content: Due to the upcoming banking holidays in Lithuania, withdrawals from Lithuanian platforms or P2P lending sites that use Lithuanian payment solutions will be delayed.

entry.id: PeerBerry is updating its Auto Invest - 2023-10-31T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry is updating its Auto Invest
entry.content: The platform improving its Auto Invest by removing old/outdated parameters. Investors are requested to review their Auto Invest settings. The platform supports up to five Auto Invest strategies.

entry.id: Deadline to receive the ECSP license in Lithuania - 2023-10-31T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Deadline to receive the ECSP license in Lithuania
entry.content: Lithuanian crowdlending platforms that don't receive the ESCP license until the 10. November 2023 won't be able to offer new investment opportunities.

entry.id: Selling and buying full bullet loans is temporarily unavailable - 2023-10-27T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Selling and buying full bullet loans is temporarily unavailable
entry.content: LANDE informed its users that the buying and selling full bullet loans is temporarily unavailable. The platform is working on fixing this issue.

entry.id: PeerBerry repays €45.86M or 91.3% of war-affected loans - 2023-10-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry repays €45.86M or 91.3% of war-affected loans
entry.content: In 20 months of the war (since February 24, 2022), PeerBerry business partners Aventus Group and Gofingo Group have, in total, repaid PeerBerry investors EUR 45.86 million or 91.3% of the total outstanding war-affected obligations. A large portion of the portfolio from the Gofingo Group is yet to be recovered.

entry.id: EstateGuru introduces a 0.05% AUM monthly fee - 2023-10-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: EstateGuru introduces a 0.05% AUM monthly fee
entry.content: EstateGuru announced that it will be deducting 0.05% "Asset Under Management" fee on newly funded investments from 01.11.2023. The monthly fee will be 0.05% (e.g., €0.5 for every €1000) of the principal balance on performing loans and is only applicable to investors who receive returns within the given month on their outstanding performing principal.

entry.id: UnaFinancial is leaving Vietnam - 2023-10-11T00:00:00Z
entry.title: UnaFinancial is leaving Vietnam
entry.content: UnaFinancial (previously Robocash Group) has decided to suspend its operations in Vietnam for the time being to prioritize development in strategic markets. The decision to suspend the business in this country resulted from careful consideration and weighing complex factors, including economic risks and the current market climate. With the Vietnamese project suspended, investors' money in RC Riga Singapore will be reallocated to fund other businesses of UnaFinancial.

entry.id: Esketit reassures investors investing in Jordan - 2023-10-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Esketit reassures investors investing in Jordan
entry.content: Despite the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, the lending business in Jordan continues running smoothly without disruption. The local lender continues to increase its lending volumes while maintaining a calculated risk profile.

entry.id: Best & worst performing platforms for September - 2023-09-17T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Best & worst performing platforms for September
entry.content: The best-performing platforms in September are Robocash, Esketit, InRento, Crowdpear, and Fintown. Click on the link below to analyze the latest statistical data.

entry.id: Robocash continues to lower the offered interest rates - 2023-09-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Robocash continues to lower the offered interest rates
entry.content: Investors on Robocash continue experiencing cash drag, which is why the platform will lower the interest rates for its loans with loan periods between 31 days to 3 years. The new interest rates will be ranging from 8% to 11%.

entry.id: Max Crowdfund's application for the ECSPR has been rejected - 2023-09-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Max Crowdfund's application for the ECSPR has been rejected
entry.content: Yesterday, the Max Crowdfund team received the official letter from the Authority Financial Markets (AFM) in the Netherlands which rejected Max Crowdfund's ECSPR license application.

entry.id: Capitalia will be under maintenance on the 16th and 17th of September - 2023-09-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Capitalia will be under maintenance on the 16th and 17th of September
entry.content: Capitalia is updating its platform which is why it may be unavailable during the scheduled maintenance period.

entry.id: Fintown lowers the minimum investment amount - 2023-09-12T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Fintown lowers the minimum investment amount
entry.content: The Czech crowdlending platform Fintown lowered the minimum investment threshold to €1 to enable investors to reinvest the earned interest quickly.

entry.id: Lendermarket is not honoring the buyback guarantee - 2023-09-12T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Lendermarket is not honoring the buyback guarantee
entry.content: Lendermarket continues not to honor the advertised buyback guarantee. The platform continues to extend loans up to six times before they appear in "pending payments" for an unknown period of time.

entry.id: Heavy Finance Website Maintenance - 2023-09-04T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Heavy Finance Website Maintenance
entry.content: The Heavy Finance platform will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on the 5. September 2023 from 4:00 CET to 12:00 CET. The website might not be accessible during this period.

entry.id: Reinvest24 will be liquidating assets in Spain to repay investors - 2023-08-25T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Reinvest24 will be liquidating assets in Spain to repay investors
entry.content: The Estonian crowdfunding platform reported that the new management in Spain would sell assets to repay investors who invested in projects such as La Canada, L' Eliana, Montesano, Xirivella, Gandia Playa, and the Casablanca projects. Reinvest24 expects the repayment of the first project within the next three to four months.

entry.id: Fintown launches a loyalty program - 2023-08-22T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Fintown launches a loyalty program
entry.content: The P2P platform Fintown launches a VIP Club. Investors with an investment amount between €10,000 and €29,999 will receive an additional 0.5% bonus on top of their investments. Investments of more than €30,000 will grant investors a 1% bonus. Any VIP bonuses can be reinvested or withdrawn after 12 months.

entry.id: PeerBerry repays € 1.8 M in war-affected loans - 2023-08-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry repays € 1.8 M in war-affected loans
entry.content: PeerBerry's business partners repaid another €1.8 M in war-affected loans from Ukraine and Russia. PeerBerry business partners have already repaid EUR 44,58 million, or 89% of the total war-affected obligations towards PeerBerry investors. Aventus Group is yet to repay €2,908,989, whereas the remaining obligation by Gofingo Group is higher at €4,380,834..

entry.id: Investors report issues with buyback guarantee from FastFinance - 2023-08-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Investors report issues with buyback guarantee from FastFinance
entry.content: Investors report delays with the lender FastFinance. The buyback guarantee hasn't been triggered. The support claims it's a technical issue.

entry.id: P2P Empire recorded an exclusive interview with the CEO of Fintown - 2023-08-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: P2P Empire recorded an exclusive interview with the CEO of Fintown
entry.content: Members of P2P Empire can enjoy our exclusive interview with the founder and CEO of Fintown. We have covered the business model, liquidity management, risks, and plans for the platform.

entry.id: Debitum changes owners and removes DEB token features - 2023-07-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Debitum changes owners and removes DEB token features
entry.content: The legal entity behind Debitum platform, DN Operator changes ownership from Mārtiņš Liberts to Henrijs Jansons, Ingus Salmiņš and Ēriks Reņģītis. The former management of Debitum Network raised over € 6 Million worth of DEB tokens to fund the platform's development. The new leadership distances itself from the DEB token and removes it from the platform, claiming the legal entity behind Debitum platform doesn't have any connection to the Token Generation Event conducted by the previous management.

entry.id: Cash Drag on Income - 2023-07-31T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Cash Drag on Income
entry.content: Income Marketplace reports low loan availability due to the season and changes in investment structures from larger lending companies. Investors should explore other top-rated platforms to get their funds invested.

entry.id: Reinvest24 replaced management in Spain due to poor portfolio performance - 2023-07-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Reinvest24 replaced management in Spain due to poor portfolio performance
entry.content: Reinvest24 is undergoing several changes in its Spanish branch. The management and its business partners, such as the construction company and real estate agency, are about to be replaced. As a result of the ongoing challenges, Reinvest24 has stopped listing investment opportunities from Spain until the portfolio quality is improved.

entry.id: Crowdpear received the ESCP license - 2023-07-27T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Crowdpear received the ESCP license
entry.content: Crowdpear became an EU-level regulated crowdfunding platform that enables the platform to provide services throughout the EU.

entry.id: Heavy Finance received the ECSP license - 2023-07-26T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Heavy Finance received the ECSP license
entry.content: Heavy Finance received the European Service Providers licenses issued by the European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA). This license provides enhanced investor protection.

entry.id: Capitalia will withold 20% income tax - 2023-07-21T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Capitalia will withold 20% income tax
entry.content: Starting from the 1st of September of this year, Capitalia will deduct a 20% personal income tax from the income received by investors - interest and late payment fees. Going forward, investors will receive the full principal amount of their loans and 80% of the total interest and late payment fees.

entry.id: Lendermarket introduced "pending payments" - 2023-07-19T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Lendermarket introduced "pending payments"
entry.content: When a Loan Originator notifies Lendermarket of a borrower's repayment, a "Pending Payment" status is assigned. At this point, Lendermarket has only received notice of the upcoming transfer. Lendermarket is still waiting for the Loan Originator to complete the transfer to Lendermarket.

entry.id: rethink-p2p reports about the questionable practices of the failed p2p platform Credon and the connection to Hive5 - 2023-07-19T00:00:00Z
entry.title: rethink-p2p reports about the questionable practices of the failed p2p platform Credon and the connection to Hive5
entry.content: The German rethink-p2p.de page reports on the harmful practices of Credon and the connection of the shareholder to Hive5's business partner. The Croatian Hive5 platform is threatening to take legal action against the author of rethink-p2p.de for the revelations of questionable practices by the shareholder of Credon and business partner of Hive5, Juozas Rupšys.

entry.id: Vivus Mexico is moving to a new direct listing structure - 2023-07-17T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Vivus Mexico is moving to a new direct listing structure
entry.content: The Mexican lending company Vivus will be listing short-term loans from Mexico under a new direct listing structure. This process has taken more time than anticipated, mainly due to IT bottlenecks on Vivus' side, and it looks like it will not be resolved in the very near future. Vivus won't be listing any new loans until the new structure is in place. The lender informed the Income Marketplace that it will clear all late loans by the 21. July 2023.

entry.id: PeerBerry repaid €42.65 M in war-affected loans - 2023-07-17T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry repaid €42.65 M in war-affected loans
entry.content: PeerBerry's business partners repaid another €1,8 M in war-affected loans from Ukraine and Russia. PeerBerry business partners have already repaid EUR 42,65 million, or 85% of the total war-affected obligations towards PeerBerry investors.

entry.id: Celsius founder Alex Mashinsky arrested and charged with fraud - 2023-07-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Celsius founder Alex Mashinsky arrested and charged with fraud
entry.content: Alex Mashinsky, the founder of bankrupt cryptocurrency lender Celsius Network, has been arrested by US authorities and charged with fraud and market manipulation.

entry.id: Lendermarket allows the investment of "pending payments" - 2023-08-05T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Lendermarket allows the investment of "pending payments"
entry.content: The P2P marketplace enables investors to invest pending payments in the currently available loans. Pending payments are funds that are not available for withdrawal as the platform doesn't dispose of the funds.

entry.id: Esketit shares information about how to handle potential investment risk - 2023-08-08T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Esketit shares information about how to handle potential investment risk
entry.content: Esketit released a statement about how the platform aims to deal with potential investment risk. In a follow-up message, the CEO confirmed that, currently, there is nothing that investors should be worried about. The platform is proactive to ensure that if certain risks materialize, they are being handled according to investors' expectations.

entry.id: Crowdpear launched a news section - 2023-08-08T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Crowdpear launched a news section
entry.content: The crowdlending platform launched a notification feature for its desktop version.

entry.id: PeerBerry has launched a news section - 2023-08-08T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry has launched a news section
entry.content: The p2p lending marketplace launched a notification feature for its desktop version.

entry.id: InRento's mailing system is being mantained - 2023-08-08T00:00:00Z
entry.title: InRento's mailing system is being mantained
entry.content: Due to the scheduled mailing service maintenance, investors might be experiencing issues with email notifications. The system should by updated by the end of next business week.

entry.id: Issues with the allocation of funds from Vivus, Mexico - 2023-08-08T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Issues with the allocation of funds from Vivus, Mexico
entry.content: Income Marketplace reported that the allocated funds from Vivus have been carried out prematurely due to data discrepancies. The team has been rolling back the transfers, which may have resulted in negative balances on customer accounts. The platform is working on resolving the issues.

entry.id: Former CEO filed a privacy complaint against P2P Empire - 2023-08-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Former CEO filed a privacy complaint against P2P Empire
entry.content: Former CEO of Twino, Anastasija Oleinika filed a privacy complaint against an interview we recorded in May 2021. She wished to be no longer associated with the content as she left the company.

entry.id: Max Crowdfund is under maintenance - 2023-08-25T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Max Crowdfund is under maintenance
entry.content: The crowdfunding platform is updating its platform, which is why the website won't be accessible until the 4th of September 2023.

entry.id: Aventus Group will finish the repayment of war-affected loans on 5th September 2023 - 2023-08-30T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Aventus Group will finish the repayment of war-affected loans on 5th September 2023
entry.content: The final repayment of €1.28 million will be processed on September 5. The Gofingo Group will continue the repayments in monthly installments of €200,000 or more until the remaining obligations of €4.18 million are repaid.

entry.id: Low loan availability on Esketit, Robocash, PeerBerry, Income, Afranga - 2023-08-31T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Low loan availability on Esketit, Robocash, PeerBerry, Income, Afranga
entry.content: The loan availability on many top-rated P2P lending platforms is low. New investors should consider suitable alternatives to earn interest from P2P lending.

entry.id: Robocash decreases the reward for loyal investors - 2023-08-31T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Robocash decreases the reward for loyal investors
entry.content: The P2P lending platform lowered the rewards for loyal investors. The minimum threshold to receive an increased interest was adjusted from €5,000 to €20,000. Investors who invest less than €20,000 won't be treated as loyal investors anymore.

entry.id: Aventus Group will finish the repayment of war-affected short-term loans on 5th September 2023 - 2023-08-30T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Aventus Group will finish the repayment of war-affected short-term loans on 5th September 2023
entry.content: The final repayment of war-affected short-term loans of €1.28 million will be processed on September 5. The Gofingo Group will continue the repayments in monthly installments of €200,000 or more until the remaining obligations of €4.18 million are repaid.

entry.id: The Robocash Group rebranded to UnaFinancial - 2023-09-07T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The Robocash Group rebranded to UnaFinancial
entry.content: One of the leading financial groups - Robocash Group, rebranded to UnaFinancial to better reflect on the group's goal to build a more diversified portfolio of financial services.

entry.id: Lendermarket replaces its CEO again - 2023-09-17T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Lendermarket replaces its CEO again
entry.content: The recently hired CEO Conor Gibney is no longer part of Lendermarket. The platform hired Carles Frederico Arnabat as the new CEO. The platform has not publicly communicated the change in management.

entry.id: Esketit starts offering USD loans - 2023-09-18T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Esketit starts offering USD loans
entry.content: Esketit started offering USD loans with a 13% interest rate from its lending partner "Money for Finance" in Jordan. All USD loans come with a buyback guarantee.

entry.id: Lande experienced a SSH-based attack - 2023-09-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Lande experienced a SSH-based attack
entry.content: The Latvian crowdlending platform informed its users about an SSH-based attack on its servers. The platform has strengthened the IT infrastructure which should prevent future incidents.

entry.id: InRento generated between 23.54% and 35.34% ROI for investors - 2023-09-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: InRento generated between 23.54% and 35.34% ROI for investors
entry.content: The Lithuanian crowdlending platform InRento has sold two properties with variable capital gains. The return on investment for this project ranged from 23.54% to 35.34%, depending on the phases that investors invested in.

entry.id: Smartcredito from Spain joins PeerBerry - 2023-09-30T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Smartcredito from Spain joins PeerBerry
entry.content: Smartcredito, launched by Aventus Group, will offer PeerBerry investors investments in short-term loans with a 10% annual return. Loans provided by Smartcredito to PeerBerry investors include a buyback and a group guarantee.

entry.id: P2P Empire interviews the CEO at Lonvest - 2023-10-20T00:00:00Z
entry.title: P2P Empire interviews the CEO at Lonvest
entry.content: The CEO Roman Katerynchyk joins P2P Empire to discuss the the lending business in Vietnam and Poland. The full interview is available for members only.

entry.id: New CEO at Income Marketplace - 2023-10-23T00:00:00Z
entry.title: New CEO at Income Marketplace
entry.content: Lavrenti Tsudakov has been promoted from COO to CEO. Kimmo Rytkönen, the founder and former CEO, will be focusing on business development.

entry.id: MaxCrowdfund is considering a possible merger with Kapitaal op Maat (KoM) - 2023-10-25T00:00:00Z
entry.title: MaxCrowdfund is considering a possible merger with Kapitaal op Maat (KoM)
entry.content: The dutch crowdlending platform is considering to merge with KoM, which holds the ECSPR license.

entry.id: LoanPlus from Sri Lanka starts listing loans on PeerBerry - 2023-10-25T00:00:00Z
entry.title: LoanPlus from Sri Lanka starts listing loans on PeerBerry
entry.content: LoanPlus will offer PeerBerry investors investments in short-term loans with an 11.5% annual return. Loans provided by LoanPlus are backed by a buyback and a group guarantee.

entry.id: Schedule of technical maintenance works - 2023-10-26T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Schedule of technical maintenance works
entry.content: Please be informed that in order to improve users' experience of InRento, from this Thursday (26 October) 4 p.m. (CEST) until next Monday (30 October) 10:00 a.m., the platform will be undergoing technical maintenance works, which may lead to disruptions. The platform will also be updating its secondary market in November which can cause temporary restrictions.

entry.id: Rapicredit repays all delayed loans - 2023-11-02T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Rapicredit repays all delayed loans
entry.content: Rapicredit from Colombia has repaid all outstanding loans to investors.

entry.id: Loan availability in Jordan has increased - 2023-11-02T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Loan availability in Jordan has increased
entry.content: Esketit reports that the loan availability from the loan originator Money for Finance in Jordan has increased.

entry.id: PeerBerry will stop offering loans from Poland - 2023-11-04T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry will stop offering loans from Poland
entry.content: The platform announced that it will stop the listing of loans from Poland from January 1, 2024, due to the regulatory change that probits lenders to fund their portfolios via P2P investors. To ensure sufficient loan supply, PeerBerry will offer investments in new lenders via a business loan. As the Polish loans represent 17% of the AUM, it might take up to Q2 2024 to replace the current loan supply.

entry.id: Vivus is facing bank issues - €500,000 is delayed - 2023-11-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Vivus is facing bank issues - €500,000 is delayed
entry.content: The founder of Income has confirmed that the outstanding portfolio of €500,000 from Vivus in Mexico is delayed due to bank transfer issues. The platform is expecting the repayment of the final amount soon.

entry.id: PeerBerry is offering investments in emerging markets - 2023-11-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry is offering investments in emerging markets
entry.content: PeerBerry has started offering new business loans, which will be used to fund the portfolios in Mexico, South Africa, Nigeria, Tanzania, and Colombia. The loan term begins at 30 days, and the offered interest rate starts at 9%. All loans are backed by the buyback and group guarantee.

entry.id: Updates on the merger with KoM - 2023-11-11T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Updates on the merger with KoM
entry.content: Kapitaal op Maat (KoM) and Max Crowdfund (MCF) have teamed up to strengthen their presence in the European crowdfunding market. KoM, leveraging its European Crowdfunding Service Provider Regulation (ECSPR) license, is expanding its crowdfunding activities across Europe following the acquisition of Capital Circle's platform. Simultaneously, MCF seeks a partnership for continuity without an ECSPR permit but with an AFM exemption. Discussions are underway for a potential merger to enhance European expansion, with both parties actively engaging potential partners. MCF is launching a Series-B equity round to fund growth, inviting existing shareholders and users of MCF, KoM, and Capital Circle. The raised funds will also go towards acquiring additional platforms, creating a unified European marketplace.

entry.id: TWINO will continue funding Polish loans via its platform from 2024 - 2023-11-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: TWINO will continue funding Polish loans via its platform from 2024
entry.content: The platform announced that the upcoming regulation doesn't impact TWINO as their lender in Poland is issuing loans via credit cards. According to TWINO's interpretation of the law, the prohibition of funding loans via P2P investors applies only for companies with a lending license that issue cash loans.

entry.id: Profitus receives the ECSP license - 2023-11-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Profitus receives the ECSP license
entry.content: The Bank of Lithuania grants Profitus the European Crowdfunding Service Provider license.

entry.id: InRento receives the ECSP license - 2023-11-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: InRento receives the ECSP license
entry.content: The Bank of Lithuania has issued InRento a European Crowdfunding (ECSP) license. Accordingly, the new license changes the procedures for calculating credit assessment scores, the suitability of a transaction for an investor, and the pricing and rates of interest. Another key change is the possibility for investors to cancel an investment within four days from the date of the transaction, however, this functionality has already been in place on the InRento platform for some time.

entry.id: ClickCash is "commited" to repay €5,000 per month - 2023-11-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: ClickCash is "commited" to repay €5,000 per month
entry.content: The problematic lender from Brazil, ClickCash is committed to repaying a fixed amount of €5,000 per month. This commitment aims to ensure a steady and predictable flow of repayments to investors. Currently, the principal amount that remains in recovery is €147,991. Should ClickCash not fulfill the repayment schedule, Income Marketplace will step in and cover the difference from its own pocket with the goal of returning the invested principal.

entry.id: PeerBerry repays €46.2M or 92% of war-affected loans - 2023-11-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry repays €46.2M or 92% of war-affected loans
entry.content: In 21 months of the war (since February 24, 2022), PeerBerry business partners Aventus Group and Gofingo Group have, in total, repaid PeerBerry investors EUR 46.2 million or 92% of the total outstanding war-affected obligations.

entry.id: Norstreet received the ESPC license - 2023-11-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Norstreet received the ESPC license
entry.content: Nordstreet has been granted a license by the Regulation on European Crowdfunding Service Providers.

entry.id: Chance to win a Kite Safari with Fintown - 2023-11-23T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Chance to win a Kite Safari with Fintown
entry.content: Active investors on Fintown, who submit the registration form by the 21. December 2023, can win a Kite Safari hosted by Fintown. The event will take place from 23 to 30 March 2024 in Egypt.

entry.id: Bondster lowers the rating of Right Choice from A- to D - 2023-11-23T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Bondster lowers the rating of Right Choice from A- to D
entry.content: Due to a mistake, Right Choice Finance has issued loans with a 10-day buyback guarantee. The loan originator cannot meet the 10-day buyback guarantee due to the deteriorated short-term liquidity of the entire financial group. Bondster has suspended the possibility of issuing new loans for Right Choice Finance and lowered its rating to D (defaulted).

entry.id: Norstreet received the ESCP license - 2023-11-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Norstreet received the ESCP license
entry.content: Nordstreet has been granted a license by the Regulation on European Crowdfunding Service Providers.

entry.id: Swaper is about to introduce business loans to finance the loan book from Poland - 2023-12-07T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Swaper is about to introduce business loans to finance the loan book from Poland
entry.content: Swaper Platform's subsidiary, SW Finance, now licensed in Estonia, will soon start offering business loans. The new investment opportunities will be used to continue funding Wandoo Finance Group's lending operations.

entry.id: Statement from DFI, the parent company of Vivus Mexico - 2023-12-07T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Statement from DFI, the parent company of Vivus Mexico
entry.content: Due to internal policy changes, DFI, the parent company of Vivus MX, is transferring financial assets from DFI Cyprus to another institution as their compliance department now denies transfers to organizations without a domicile banking license. The migration process is underway and expected to finish in 3-5 days, after which repayment will resume, with DFI expressing regret for any inconvenience caused. Vivus MX is yet to repay €553,143 to investors.

entry.id: Update on the legal recovery in Moldova - 2023-12-08T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Update on the legal recovery in Moldova
entry.content: Attached please find the decision of the Bălți Court in regard to the accelerated restructuring procedure of SRL "Metropolis City". The court has decided in favor of the borrower, meaning all the legal actions are on hold, including the calculation of accrued interest and penalties.

entry.id: GoFingo repays another €200,000 - 2023-12-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: GoFingo repays another €200,000
entry.content: Gofingo Group repaid investors €200,000 in war-affected loans. In 22 months of the war in Ukraine, PeerBerry business partners Aventus Group and Gofingo Group have, in total, repaid investors €46.5 M or 92.6% of the total outstanding war-affected obligations.

entry.id: Fintown publishes another FLEXI project - 2023-12-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Fintown publishes another FLEXI project
entry.content: The Czech-based platform Fintown published another FLEXI project with 8% APY and 30-day lock-up period.

entry.id: Afranga received the ECSP license - 2023-12-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Afranga received the ECSP license
entry.content: During the transition period from investments in claim rights to business loans, Afranga.com will temporarily pause new registrations.

entry.id: KIRSAN took money from apartment buyers and started the insolvency process - 2023-12-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: KIRSAN took money from apartment buyers and started the insolvency process
entry.content: Several construction companies under the umbrella of the "Kirsan" concern in Moldova have reached insolvency. The risk of potential bankruptcy upset those who invested their last money just to get an apartment in the capital. People, who have been waiting for years to receive the keys to their new homes, are outraged and worried.

entry.id: Scheduled maintenance on EstateGuru - 2023-12-26T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Scheduled maintenance on EstateGuru
entry.content: EstateGuru is conducting scheduled website maintenance between 26/12/2023 at 7:00 (EET) and 27/12/2023 at 10:00 (EET). During this period, login to the portal, and new registrations will be unavailable.

entry.id: Esketit starts offering investments in non-performing loans from Spain - 2024-01-11T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Esketit starts offering investments in non-performing loans from Spain
entry.content: Esketit introduces a new investment opportunity in collaboration with Spanda Capital, specializing in acquiring discounted non-performing consumer loan portfolios in Spain. The product offers a 12% interest rate with a 24-month repayment schedule, featuring interest payments for the first six months and partial principal repayments starting from the 7th month. Listed under its Latvian holding company, the investment will be integrated into Esketit's Automated Diversified strategy from January 18th.

entry.id: The platform is raising funds to cover legal fees for its projects in Moldova - 2024-01-09T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The platform is raising funds to cover legal fees for its projects in Moldova
entry.content: Reinvest24 is raising funds from "a limited group of verified investors, who have a serious interest in Reinvest24 succeeding with the legal recovery". Many concerned investors are questioning Reinvest24's intentions, given the platform is not replying to emails and is delaying withdrawals for up to 40 days. Since Reinvest24 is not regulated in Estonia, it's questionable whether the company can raise further funds from retail investors. Reinvest24 has not given enough information about the legal action or the portfolio performance in Spain. Any further investments on this platform are connected with extreme risk.

entry.id: The issuance of crowdlending offers in EU member states without a respective license is prohibited - 2024-01-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The issuance of crowdlending offers in EU member states without a respective license is prohibited
entry.content: Crowdfunding service providers who are registered in EU member states and have failed to obtain authorization by 10 November 2023, in accordance with the regulation 2020/1503 recital 77 are service providers are prohibited from raising funds via crowdfunding offers. Investors who believe that a crowdfunding platform doesn't have the required authorization and continues issuing crowdfunding offers can contact the local police.

entry.id: Gofingo Group repays another €200.000 in war-affected loans - 2024-01-15T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Gofingo Group repays another €200.000 in war-affected loans
entry.content: Throughout the 23-month war period, commencing on February 24, 2022, PeerBerry's business partners have successfully fulfilled their commitments by repaying a total of EUR 46.8 million to PeerBerry investors. This amounts to an impressive 93.2% of the overall outstanding obligations impacted by the conflict.

entry.id: UnaPay temporarily halts new loans and announces closure of existing loans - 2024-01-18T00:00:00Z
entry.title: UnaPay temporarily halts new loans and announces closure of existing loans
entry.content: UnaPay announces a temporary halt on new loan placements and the closure of all existing loans by the end of February. Repayment of principal and accrued interest on current loans will be conducted promptly.

entry.id: Submit your questions for EstateGuru's CEO - 2024-01-24T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Submit your questions for EstateGuru's CEO
entry.content: P2P Empire will be interviewing the CEO of EstateGuru, Mihkel Stamm. Submit your questions to discuss the platform's current state and plans for recovering defaulted loans. Your participation is crucial for an informative dialogue.

entry.id: Exclusive: Esketit Investment Update! - 2024-01-27T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Exclusive: Esketit Investment Update!
entry.content: Explore Esketit's revamped loan offerings in a candid interview with CEO Vitalijs Zalovs. Get insights into investment structures, risks, and guarantees without any fluff. Topics covered include the impact of Gaza on Jordan's portfolio, potential conflict scenarios, AvaFin's 2024 plans, investments in music royalties and defaulted Spanish loans.

entry.id: The Estonian Financial Supervisory has issued a warning in regards to the activities of Reinvest24 - 2024-01-30T00:00:00Z
entry.title: The Estonian Financial Supervisory has issued a warning in regards to the activities of Reinvest24
entry.content: The Estonian Financial Supervisor is warning investors about the suspicion that Reinvest24 continues to offer crowdfunding services without authorization.

entry.id: Top-up option is unavailable - 2024-02-01T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Top-up option is unavailable
entry.content: Lonvest has disabled the top-up option on the platform.

entry.id: Reinvest24 has suspended secondary market transaction - 2024-02-06T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Reinvest24 has suspended secondary market transaction
entry.content: The platform informed investors that it is temporarily pausing transactions on the secondary market. Last month, the Estonian Financial Supervisory issued a warning as Reinvest24 is operating without the necessary authorization.

entry.id: New lender and legal actions against Right Choice Finance - 2024-02-07T00:00:00Z
entry.title: New lender and legal actions against Right Choice Finance
entry.content: Bondster announced that it is now listing loans from Advanto, a Czech fintech providing employee benefit of early earned wage access. The platform also revealed that it started legal actions against Right Choice Finance as the company failed to fulfill the buyback guarantee.

entry.id: LANDE received the ECSP license - 2024-02-12T00:00:00Z
entry.title: LANDE received the ECSP license
entry.content: The Supervision Committee of Latvijas Banka has issued the Crowdfunding Services Authorization to the LANDE Platform.

entry.id: Gofingo Group repays €200.000 in war-affected loans - 2024-02-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Gofingo Group repays €200.000 in war-affected loans
entry.content: Gofingo Group has repaid €7.19 M in war-affected loans so far. Gofingo's remaining obligations are €2.9 M.

entry.id: Gofingo Group repaid another €200,000 - 2024-03-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Gofingo Group repaid another €200,000
entry.content: In 25 months of the war, PeerBerry business partners have repaid € 47.36 M, or 94.3% of the total outstanding war-affected obligations to investors.

entry.id: Capitec acquires controlling shares in Avafin for €26.3 million - 2024-04-02T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Capitec acquires controlling shares in Avafin for €26.3 million
entry.content: The South African bank Capitec is increasing its shares in Avafin Holding Limited from 40.66% to 97.69% for a purchase price of €26.3 million.

entry.id: Aventus Group made €53.8 M in net profit in 2023 - 2024-04-03T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Aventus Group made €53.8 M in net profit in 2023
entry.content: Lending companies operating under the Aventus Group name made €53.8 M in net profits in 2023, an annual increase of 260%.

entry.id: Capitalia is adding a knowledge assessment test and the loss simulator - 2024-04-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Capitalia is adding a knowledge assessment test and the loss simulator
entry.content: Capitalia has added more risk-related features that help investors better understand the risks connected to the funding of business loans.

entry.id: TWINO is exiting the lending business in Vietnam and in the Philippines - 2024-04-11T00:00:00Z
entry.title: TWINO is exiting the lending business in Vietnam and in the Philippines
entry.content: TWINO announced that it will exit the joint venture lending business with VIA SMS Group in Vietnam due to the "increasingly challenging local business environment." Additionally, the TWINO Group has made a strategic decision to exit the Philippines venture, therefore suspending its operations in the Asia-Pacific region.

entry.id: AvaFin published audited financial report for 2023 - 2024-04-12T00:00:00Z
entry.title: AvaFin published audited financial report for 2023
entry.content: The AvaFin group ended FY 2023 with €32 M in equity, €80 M in liabilities, and €7.8 M in net profit. Auditors did not report any misstatements.

entry.id: LANDE is strengthening its debt collection procedures - 2024-04-16T00:00:00Z
entry.title: LANDE is strengthening its debt collection procedures
entry.content: LANDE announce new collaborations with debt collection lawyers in Latvia and Lithuania to speed up the recovery of defaulted loans.

entry.id: Audited financials from Money for Finance and the decrease of interest rates for Jordanian loans - 2024-04-23T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Audited financials from Money for Finance and the decrease of interest rates for Jordanian loans
entry.content: Money for Finance released its financials for 2023. The company reports €28.57 M in revenue, €4.16 M in net profit, and €5.49 M in equity. From April 29th, the platform will list Jordanian EUR loans at 11% and USD loans at 12%.

entry.id: InRento publishes the audited annual report for 2023 - 2024-04-25T00:00:00Z
entry.title: InRento publishes the audited annual report for 2023
entry.content: The company reports the following financials for 2023: €170,000 in net profit, €758,456 in revenue, and €350,596 in equity. According to the auditor, the financial statements give a true and fair view of the financial position.

entry.id: PeerBerry continues to grow amidst regulatory challenges - 2024-05-01T00:00:00Z
entry.title: PeerBerry continues to grow amidst regulatory challenges
entry.content: In April, PeerBerry's portfolio hit EUR 110.59 million, despite a dip in loan funding to EUR 45.52 million due to fewer offerings, influenced by regulatory changes in Kazakhstan. Investors still earned EUR 901,552 in interest, with expectations for increased short-term loan availability in May.

entry.id: VIAINVEST repaid 60% of the outstanding credit lines - 2024-05-09T00:00:00Z
entry.title: VIAINVEST repaid 60% of the outstanding credit lines
entry.content: VIAINVEST has repaid around 60% of the outstanding credit lines from 2021 to 2022. The platform plans to repay all credit lines by the end of June 2024. VIAINVEST refused to share the amount of outstanding credit lines or the outstanding portfolio amount with P2P Empire.

entry.id: Debitum reports a loss for 2023 - 2024-05-10T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Debitum reports a loss for 2023
entry.content: Debitum published the audited financial report for 2023. The platform reports a loss of €358,634 in 2023. While the financial statements give a true and fair view of the financial position of the company, the auditor Grand Thorton reports a material misstatement of certain information in the report.

entry.id: Esketit expands its mortgage loan offerings - 2024-05-23T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Esketit expands its mortgage loan offerings
entry.content: Esketit announced the expansion of its mortgage-backed loan offerings issued by Credus Capital, which operates under the same management as A24 Group. The loans come with a loan period of three years.

entry.id: Mintos launches passive real estate investments - 2024-05-24T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Mintos launches passive real estate investments
entry.content: Mintos enables investors to invest in financial instruments connected to rental residential real estate. Investors receive regular rental income with the option to liquidate the investment on the secondary market.

entry.id: Danabijak released its financials for 2023 - 2024-05-24T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Danabijak released its financials for 2023
entry.content: Based on the financial statement provided for 2023, the Company's total revenue in 2023 was 994,000 EUR, a 15% decrease compared to 2022. Danabijak generated an operating profit of 13,000 EUR last year. In 2023, the balance sheet increased by 38% to 713,000 EUR. As of 31.12.2023, the total value of the Company’s share capital was 818,000 EUR.

entry.id: Income Marketplace increases the loan offerings - 2024-05-28T00:00:00Z
entry.title: Income Marketplace increases the loan offerings
entry.content: Lending partners such as DanaRupiah, the ITF Group, Hoovi, or the Current Auto increased their loan supply, which reduces cash drag for investors on the platform.
